summary: This code sets the audio language model and specifies its configuration. It uses a subtitle detector with an input file located at "/root/Desktop/works/pyjom/src/samples/video/dog_with_text.mp4". The speed of processing is set to 1.5x, and the output file is generated from the template at "/root/Desktop/works/pyjom/src/test/audiolang.mdl.j2" with format arguments "some_number": 2 and "some_text": "shit".
